# DOSPRN Website Index for LLMs

## Overview
DOSPRN is a Windows-based utility that enables printing from legacy DOS applications to modern printers.

## Key Pages
- Homepage: https://www.dosprn.com/index.htm
  Description: Introduction to DOSPRN, its features, and use cases.

- Download: https://www.dosprn.com/download.htm  
  Description: Access to the latest version of DOSPRN and installation instructions.

- Registration: https://www.dosprn.com/login.htm
  Description: Licensing information, pricing, and activation details.

## Documentation
- FAQ: https://www.dosprn.com/faq.htm
  Description: Frequently asked questions about setup, compatibility, and printing.

- Settings: https://www.dosprn.com/readme.htm
  Description: Guidance on font configuration for DOS printing.

## Latest News
- News: https://www.dosprn.com/news.htm
  Description: Changes in versions.

## Localization
- Spanish Version: https://spanish.dosprn.com
- Portuguese Version: https://portuguese.dosprn.com
- Ukrainian Version: https://ukrainian.dosprn.com
- Polish Version: https://polska.dosprn.com
- Hebrew Version: https://dosprn.co.il
- Indeonesian Version: https://indonesian.dosprn.com
- Indian Version: https://indian.dosprn.com
